MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL21 postcode area of Corwen, affecting properties in Gwyddelwern and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.57PM. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and have established that there is a fault on our overhead line network affecting the remaining customers. Our specialists are now on site and will work to restore power to all remaining customers as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.53PM on 20th December 2020.
